Posts.Content: Thankyou so much Dreamthief and Kathleenj, It is something I must  find out, although I am seeing surgeon on wed 29th. Maybe I will be patient and wait to ask him --or maybe not. xxbig hug to both of you x
Posts.Title: I would appreciate some knowledge ladies-and gents

Posts.Content: I had a trace on my lymph nodes before op in nuclear medicine dept, but they didn't remove any during my op, is this normal, will I have another op to remove them? P.S. I didn't wait after op to speak to my surgeon.
Posts.Title: I would appreciate some knowledge ladies-and gents

Posts.Content: Sorry for jumping about so much, but I will get used to it. I just want to tell you something. There is a lady in my gym who had a masectomy in 1984, it came back and she had some more treatment. She is my hero at the moment. She is in the pool most days, bless her, she looks fab.x
Posts.Title: Lady in my gym

Posts.Content: Hello susie-sue and everyone, I am finding your posts so comforting. I am afraid I don't understand all the jargon and abreviations yet. If the other girls tell you it will disappear, I am sure it will. You seem to be doing so well, I hope I am as good as you. I am sure it isn't as noticeable as you think.xxxxx
Posts.Title: I'm growing a hairy,furry face!!!

Posts.Content: Hi, susie-sue, yes I am new, I have my op on 15th july. Getting very nervous.xx
Posts.Title: I'm growing a hairy,furry face!!!

Posts.Content: Hi, Dreamthief and all, Thanks for your kind advice, it has appeared within the last 4 days, I think, although to be honest I have'nt poked about, I found it by accident and it hurt at first  {a lot] I am going to wait til I see my Doc on Wednesday. It is not red or weepy but I am concerned. I will let you know all about it after I see Doctor. Thanks again eveyone, you are brave and lovelyx
Posts.Title: A question for my friends

Posts.Content: Hello all,I had my op on 29th july, all ok but I have definate lump above the scar, is this common? Surely the Doc would have seen a new cancer lmup during my op wouldnt he? I am back for follow up appointment on Wednesday, Please God all is ok.
